the symptoms to 
look out for. They can appear 
suddenly,	often	within	the	first	
two weeks following the birth of 
the baby. Seeking help quickly 
will ensure that you are treated 
as early as possible, to help you 
get well again.
Postpartum psychosis is 
a serious mental illness 
that should be treated as a 
medical emergency. If not 
treated immediately, you can 
get rapidly worse and could 
neglect or harm your baby or 
yourself.
Usually women with this illness 
will require admission to
